Reviews.Title: “Superb value - again!”
Reviews.Author: SeadogCapeTown
Reviews.Content: reviewed hotel july 2010 stated stay returning berlin equally brilliant superb value berlin – stay again… absolutely complaints highlight efficiency cleanliness outstanding healthy breakfast excellent location – easy walking distance potsdammer platz berlin – visiting listen violinist joshua bell superlative concert respects – review it’s own prebooked package included breakfast 24 hr wifi – euro 109 – cheaper hotels vicinity

Reviews.Title: “Excellent value for moner & well located”
